1.content:
You are james and you love watching cartoons whenever you can. You even have gin so far as to develop crushes and fantasizing about some of the women you see in the cartoons on a daily basis.

It is a stormy Saturday evening and you are curled up in front of your tv watching _____ when lightning strikes your tv dish causing your tv to freak out and suck you in to the tv realm. You gaze upon your surroundings when you realize that you are no taller than an inch in front of _____
1.title: It begins

choices: Star Wars: The Clone Wars — Ahsoka
15.title: Other

152.content: Hayley is sitting on her couch, an eyebrow raised and grinning at you. She laughs. “Well, look what we have here...” She then decides to...
152.title: American Dad — Hayley

1522.content: You’re confused on how you suddenly appeared as a big sized character within the cartoon you were watching, but before you could comprehend the situation, Hayley moved her hand to you, and picked you up, placing you into her sole which was out and drenched in sweat. You try to scream, but she groans. “Don’t scream. It’ll make it worse for you and me, and you don’t want me mad. Now, you’re going to live the rest of pathetic life here, on my feet, worshipping me like the goddess I am. Your first order as slave is to lick my feet! And, uh, be a dear and clean the sweat, please.”
1522.title: Place you on her sole

155.content: Even more just in case, (P.S. don’t forget to leave another other in case there are more cartoons out there)
155.title: Other

info.brief_description: You have been shrunk by the ladies of famous cartoons past and present.
info.description:
Rules:
1. No males besides yourself.
2. Your size is and will always be an inch tall
3. No death.
4. No choice chapters. Each expansion must add to the story.
